ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I am looking into research. Im a magician and I just turned 16th and
this is what i know so far.. but have some holes in what i know and
need some answers.

I have trained research skill (only can put one point into it)

I have bought magils Consortume vol 1. has pet spells and heat
stone in it. (most guilds have it ~3pp)

It is written in old erudin. I have train this about 15 or 20 times. But I
saw about the same result when I trained it for about 4. Im "very
bad" at it now.

I open, close, open, close, open the book and can read a couple of
words at a time. I think the better at the language you are the more
random words you can see at a time.

The thing that you can combine spells in is called an Elemental
Grimoire (11pp - neriak has it for example)

all the spells in this book take Word of Tyrany.

example

Earth elemental
Elemental: earth elemental (i believe this is the next lower spell for
this )
Word: words of tyrany
other iterm : block of ore

So for a 16 level pet you would add a 12 lvl pet scroll, words of
tyrany and a block of ore into the Elemental Grimoire. click
combine. And *Poof* if you dont fail you get a new 16th lvl pet. Note
I have not done this.

Ok here are the questions: Please only speak from what you Know
not what you have heard, or think, or speculate. I have plenty of that
myself.

1) level 16 and 20 lvl pet are at merchants in certain cities.. (not
going to tell ya in this email) So why would you make a pet from
research. Are they the same?

2) Does this work for any level pet, ie 16 , 20, 24,? could you
practice with, lets say a 12 lvl pet. ie 8th lvl pet +wot+ore = 12th lvl
pet?

3) What monster have word of tyarany. I know random but which
one in your experience.. which zones.

4) I believe that Words of tyrany are only are magician Is this
true? I surmise this from a post that GZ posted that there "were 13
of the 14 classes that would NOT be able to use your spell
component so trading should be easy".

5) Is word of tyrany the component for all research spells. Like the
ones in vol II of the Magil's consortdium?

6) ok on pet if what i have down so far is correct ie ( pet spell -
1rank+WOT+Regent) then for the 36th lvl pet spell you need to
create a spell for a 32th lvl pet.. This would take a 28th lvl pet which
would take a 24 lvl pet.. and so on.. is this what you correct? what if
you fail on any of these.. you get to start over? Ouch the 49th lvl pet
is going to be tough..

7) What component wizard need for there spells?



Im on vershaan , name is akdov. If you are not a magician and
have word of tyrany i'll buy them for a fair price and tell you when i
get yours..please email mail me (no reply all pls) or tell to me in
game.
